stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Host ice has -1 strength for each hosted virus counter. When you encounter host ice, if its strength is 0 or less, trash it. Otherwise, place 1 virus counter on this program.
text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Host ice has -1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
When you encounter host ice, if its strength is 0 or less, trash it. Otherwise, place 1 virus counter on this program.
title: Chisel
